Use core tags
<@import prefix="c" taglib="phpf.core" type="static"/>

<b>if tag<b> 	
parameters test
 sample if
{{{
<c:if test="{$name=='bora'}">
<c:out value={$name}/>
</c:if>
}}}

<b>else tag<b> 	
 sample else
{{{
<c:if test="{$name=='bora'}">
<c:out value="{$name}"/>
<c:else>
<c:out value="other name {$name}"/>
</c:else>
</c:if>
}}}

<b>elseif tag<b> 	
parameters test
 sample elseif
{{{
<c:if test="{$name=='bora'}">
<c:out value="{$name}"/>
<c:elseif test={$name=='obama'}>
<c:out value="name obama"/>
</c:elseif>
</c:if>
}}}

<b>for tag<b> 	
parameters var ,begin, to,step
 sample elseif
{{{
<c:for var="$i" begin="1" to="10" step="1">
<c:out value="{$i}"/>
</c:for>
}}}
Out 1,2,3,4,5,6,7,9,10
